long_description: The lightweight, relaxed and vegan-friendly Patagonia Activist Canvas Shoes for men feature durable canvas and synthetic uppers, with grippy lugged soles for great traction outdoors. High-abrasion synthetic suede rand resists tough scrapes. Barefoot construction with non-removable, integrated footbed is comfortable and breathable. Recycled EVA midsole has heel air cushion for underfoot protection. Recycled rubber outsole with stout lugs provides traction on unstable terrain. Patagonia Activist Canvas Shoes for men have a medium width and medium arch/instep.
short_description: The lightweight, relaxed and vegan-friendly Patagonia Activist Canvas Shoes for men feature durable canvas and synthetic uppers, with grippy lugged soles for great traction outdoors.
